messages.content: As your MP for the last 27 years, I have always put the needs of my constituents first. From securing £400m to rebuild Whipps Cross, getting extra funding for our schools and supporting the plan to put 20,000 more police on the streets, your needs have been at the heart of all I have done.

Now, as we face an election, I am right behind our Prime Minister, Boris Johnson in being committed to honour our original commitment to respect the 2016 referendum result, to leave the European Union and get Brexit done.

Only a Conservative majority government can get Brexit done and then focus on delivering the strong economy that allows us to get 20,000 more police, higher funding for schools and colleges and, vitally, that extra £33.9bn for the NHS in the next Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to respect the 2016 referendum result and leave the European Union.
Focus on delivering a strong economy to support additional police and higher funding for schools and NHS.

mentions.candidate: I need your support to help the Conservatives win this election.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Chingford & Woodford Green is a marginal seat and Jeremy Corbyn wants to take it, but we can stop Corbyn with your help.

issues.brexitEurope: honour our original commitment to respect the 2016 referendum result, to leave the European Union and get Brexit done.
issues.economy: strong economy that allows us to get 20,000 more police, higher funding for schools and colleges and, vitally, that extra £33.9bn for the NHS in the next Parliament.
issues.education: getting extra funding for our schools
issues.health: that extra £33.9bn for the NHS in the next Parliament.
